mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ojt_review ( bathhouse_info_id, member_id, content, rating ) VALUES ( #{bathhouseInfoId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, b.bathhouse_info_id AS bathhouseInfoId, r.member_id AS memberId, r.content AS content, r.rating AS rating, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.updated_at AS updatedAt, m.name AS name FROM ojt_review r INNER JOIN ojt_member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN ojt_bathhouse_info b on r.bathhouse_info_id = b.bathhouse_info_id WHERE b.bathhouse_info_id = #{bathhouseInfoId} ORDER BY review_id
